instance.context:
They had come not to admire but to observe . `` It 's worse inside '' , Thornburg informed Andy . `` Skolman 's jammed in every table he could find . Under the
heading of_it 's an ill wind , et_cetera '' . Backstage was tomb like by contrast . Andy 's co-workers kept their distance , awed by the tragedy . But in his dressing_room was a large bouquet and a card that read , `` We 're with you all_the_way '' .
